overview: One of them is a pedophile. The other is a victim of sexual abuse. This is their unbelievable love story. Already proclaimed as a world-wide underground cult classic, this is the Swedish LGBT film that shook the world of its viewers with a horrifying story of sexual abuse and homophobia in modern-day Sweden. Critics have compared it to films like Uncle David and to playwrights like Harold Pinter.
title: Happiness at Its Worst
